mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.model_id AS "modelId", a.model_name AS "modelName", a.url AS "url", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", u.name AS "createBy.name", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.create_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO collection( id, model_id, model_name, url, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{modelId}, #{modelName}, #{url}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE collection SET model_id = #{modelId}, model_name = #{modelName}, url = #{url}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
